properties.name: ip.otp.limit.duration
properties.description: Duration (in minutes) for which OTP request limits apply per IP.

properties.name: ip.otp.limit
properties.description: Maximum number of OTP requests allowed per IP within the rate limit window.

properties.name: otp.cooldown
properties.description: Cooldown period (in seconds) between consecutive OTP requests from the same IP.

properties.name: app.otp.duration
properties.description: Expiration duration (in minutes) for OTP validity.

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for signing JWT tokens. Should be stored securely.

properties.name: app.session.duration
properties.description: Time (in minutes) a temporary signup session is valid in Redis.
